categories: Category:Jedi Consulars of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Iodana was a female Human Jedi who served the Jedi Order aboard the space station Carrick Station, selling combat gear during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the resurgent Sith Empire.

Iodana first appeared in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare in 2011, as a PvP Ranked Gear Vendor for the Jedi Consular class. Iodana's appearance and gear was changed with the release of Game Update 2.0, when the elder game gear system was overhauled. She was later removed in Game Update 5.0 on November 29, 2016, which retired the PvP and PvE gear vendors in favor of the Command system.
